name: tb-nightly
summary: TensorBoard lets you watch Tensors Flow

chunks.text:
TensorBoard is a suite of web applications for inspecting and understanding
your TensorFlow runs and graphs.

Releases prior to 1.6.0 were published under the ``tensorflow-tensorboard`` name
and may be found at https://pypi.python.org/pypi/tensorflow-tensorboard.

usage_description: This library is used to facilitate inspection and understanding of TensorFlow runs and graphs through a suite of web applications, allowing developers to gain insights into their models' performance. With TensorBoard, developers can visualize and analyze the data flow within their TensorFlow applications.
